overview: 2012 marks Kary Ng's 10th anniversary in the Cantopop world. In addition to the release of her hit album My January in the summer of 2012, Kary also took the stage of the Hong Kong Coliseum for the second time in her career in January 2013 with The Present Concert. In addition to hit songs from My January like concert theme song The Present, Kary also performs hits from her Golden Typhoon era, including "From Love to Hate," "Love is the Biggest Right," and "Mountain Song," her duet with Justin Lo.  This edition features the concert on both Blu-ray and CD. It comes with a bonus DVD containing the making of the concert.
title: Kary Ng The Present Concert 2013
